data_table.description: Retinal Examination Form, Exam 3. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: REXA1
variable.description: When was the last time you saw a doctor, optometrist, or eye specialist concerning your vision? Q1 [Retinal Examination Form, exam 3]
variable.value: At least 1 year but less than 2 years
At least 2 years but less than 3 years

variable.name: REXA2A
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you had sugar diabetes? Q2a [Retinal Examination Form, exam 3]

variable.name: REXA2B
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you have eye problems as a result of diabetes? Q2b [Retinal Examination Form, exam 3]

variable.name: REXA2C
variable.description: Which eye or eyes were affected? Q2c [Retinal Examination Form, exam 3]

variable.name: REXA2D
variable.description: Have you ever had laser treatments on your eyes for diabetes? Q2d [Retinal Examination Form, exam 3]

variable.name: REXA2E
variable.description: On which eye or eyes? Q2e [Retinal Examination Form, exam 3]

variable.name: REXA3A
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you have eye problems as a result of glaucoma, or increased pressure inside one or both of your eyes? Q3a [Retinal Examination Form, exam 3]

variable.name: REXA3B
variable.description: Which eye or eyes were affected? Q3b [Retinal Examination Form, exam 3]

variable.name: REXA4A
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you have eye problems as a result of age-related macular degeneration? Q4a [Retinal Examination Form, exam 3]

variable.name: REXA4B
variable.description: Which eye or eyes were affected? Q4b [Retinal Examination Form, exam 3]

variable.name: REXA4C
variable.description: Have you ever had laser treatments on your eyes for macular degeneration? Q4c [Retinal Examination Form, exam 3]

variable.name: REXA4D
variable.description: On which eye or eyes? Q4d [Retinal Examination Form, exam 3]

variable.name: REXA5A
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you have eye problems as a result of cataracts, or cloudiness of the lens, in one or both of your eyes? Q5a [Retinal Examination Form, exam 3]

variable.name: REXA5B
variable.description: Which eye or eyes were affected? Q5b [Retinal Examination Form, exam 3]

variable.name: REXA5C
variable.description: Have you ever had eye surgery because of cataracts? Q5c [Retinal Examination Form, exam 3]

variable.name: REXA5D
variable.description: On which eye or eyes? Q5d [Retinal Examination Form, exam 3]

variable.name: REXA6A
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you have eye problems as a result of blockage of an artery or vein in one or both of your eyes? Q6a [Retinal Examination Form, exam 3]

variable.name: REXA6B
variable.description: Which eye or eyes were affected? Q6b [Retinal Examination Form, exam 3]

variable.name: REXA6C
variable.description: Have you ever had laser treatments on your eyes for this blockage? Q6c [Retinal Examination Form, exam 3]

variable.name: REXA6D
variable.description: On which eye or eyes? Q6d [Retinal Examination Form, exam 3]

variable.name: REXA7A
variable.description: Have you ever had eye surgery for another condition? Q7a [Retinal Examination Form, exam 3]

variable.name: REXA7B
variable.description: What was the condition? Q7b [Retinal Examination Form, exam 3]

variable.name: REXA7C
variable.description: On which eye or eyes? Q7c [Retinal Examination Form, exam 3]

variable.name: REXA8A
variable.description: Have you ever had laser treatments on your eyes for another condition? Q8a [Retinal Examination Form, exam 3]

variable.name: REXA8B
variable.description: What was the condition? Q8b [Retinal Examination Form, exam 3]

variable.name: REXA8C
variable.description: On which eye or eyes? Q8c [Retinal Examination Form, exam 3]

variable.name: REXA9A
variable.description: Are you completely blind in one or both eyes? Q9a [Retinal Examination Form, exam 3]

variable.name: REXA9B
variable.description: In which eye? Q9b [Retinal Examination Form, exam 3]

variable.name: REXA10A
variable.description: Have you ever had an eye removed? Q10a [Retinal Examination Form, exam 3]

variable.name: REXA10B
variable.description: Which eye was removed? Q10b [Retinal Examination Form, exam 3]

variable.name: REXA11
variable.description: Type of eye selection? Q11 [Retinal Examination Form, exam 3]

variable.name: REXA12
variable.description: Which eye was photographed? Q12 [Retinal Examination Form, exam 3]

variable.name: REXA13
variable.description: Reason for not photographing? Q13 [Retinal Examination Form, exam 3]

variable.name: REXAFLAG
variable.description: Indicator for presence of form [Retinal Examination Form, exam 3]

variable.name: REXACY
variable.description: Contact year [7] [Retinal Examination Form, exam 3]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC participant ID [Retinal Examination Form, exam 3]
